mapper.select:
select
FROM xz_job_exp j LEFT JOIN xz_job_exp_domain d on j.jobexp_id = d.job_exp_id LEFT JOIN xz_field f on d.field_id = f.field_id where f.field_type = 1 or f.field_type is null and resume_id = #{resumeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
